title: Tail fillet of beef with blue cheese 'bonbons'
description: Surprise your guests with these delightful blue cheese and potato balls to be served with top-notch steak.
ingredients: 5oz/150g potatoes, peeled, boiled and passed through a potato ricer
vegetable or sunflower oil, for deep-frying
2 x 450g/16oz beef tail fillets, on the bone
salt and freshly ground black pepper
